name: MVProc
short_description:
MVProc is a Model-View-Controller module for Apache2 that facilitates using MySQL stored procedures as the controller element. Currently seeking a Champion for introduction to the Apache Incubator...

NOTE: Versions 1.4+ is for Apache2.4 - in order to run on Apache2.2, replace request_rec->useragent_ip references with request_rec->connection->remote_ip
(there are 3 in the source code)
